info.name: Firefox Dark Persona Optimized (Windows 7)
info.description:
This style attempts to maximize screen real estate with some aesthetics. Specifically, it does the following:

1. Slims navigation bar
2. Adds gradient to url bar
3. Restyles drop down menus (including url bar drop down)
4. Restyles Firefox application button
5. Makes a few of the default toolbar buttons more colorful
6. Slims and sharpens tab bar
7. Removes "list all tabs" and "group tabs" buttons
8. Autohides status/add-on bar (hover over bottom right-hand corner of Firefox window to make it appear)

If you don't like one of these features, simply delete it from the style's code under the relevant heading.
info.additionalInfo:
I use this style with (roughly in order of importance):

1. The default theme AND tabs displayed above the url bar
2. Dark persona or (http://userstyles.org/styles/33773)
3. Custom toolbar buttons add-on (http://codefisher.org/toolbar_button/)
4. Colorful tabs add-on (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1368/)
5. Find as you type add-on (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/3650/)
6. Organize status bar add-on (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1759/)

Note: Restart your browser for the tab bar to display properly.

Worked off of mNiosu's style (http://userstyles.org/styles/60503/auto-hide-add-on-bar-with-styled-find-bar) to incorporate the add-on bar auto hide functionality.

Updates:

1/6/12 - Reduced height of tab bar, made some modifications to Firefox app menu button, and fixed display of cross for new tab button when hovered over
1/8/12 - Made background of add-on manager grey and fixed issue with new tab button overlaying the add-on manager
1/16/12 - Fixed color add-on bar
2/5/12 - Fixed height of pinned tabs and Firefox button
3/8/12 - Repositioned cross in new tab button and tab close buttons
5/6/12 - Changed auto hide code for add-on bar using mNiosu's style, since the code I was using no longer worked
7/30/12 - Updated navigation bar size for Waterfox 14
3/5/13 - Fixed issue that was lengthening time of browser startup
